definition: wine doesn't make men drunk: men get themselves intoxicated. Lust does not overpower men: men surrender themselves to lust
pinyin: jiu3 bu4 zui4 ren2 ren2 zi4 zui4 , se4 bu4 mi2 ren2 ren2 zi4 mi2
containing_words.word: 酒不醉人人自醉，色不迷人人自迷

sentences.english: The Rooks Holiday Hotel, Mae Hong Son is set in the midst of a fascinating valley in Northern Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 茹克思假日飯店坐落在泰國北部一處迷人的山谷之中。

sentences.english: With long-lasting fragrance, double your charm.
sentences.chinese: 香味幽長用後倍增迷人魅力。

sentences.english: Down town Naperville gives you a feel of a charming small town; yet with a big city dynamics. There are many restaurants;
sentences.chinese: 瑞珀市中心是一個迷人的小鎮，但也有大城市的活力。

sentences.english: They are gorgeously captivating and comparable to that of legendary cruisers, and customized choppers.
sentences.chinese: 他們華麗的迷人和相若的傳奇巡洋艦和定製的摩托車。

sentences.english: The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.
sentences.chinese: 表現了牛在溪邊飲水的迷人的田園風光。

sentences.english: Then the lovely young mother showed the signet ring as proof.
sentences.chinese: 這位年輕又迷人的母親當衆出示了圖章戒指以作證明。

sentences.english: Understands the appreciation, you also then have the enchanting graceful bearing.
sentences.chinese: 懂得欣賞，你也便擁有迷人的風姿。

sentences.english: Watching her walk away, I felt the enchantment of the night begin to evaporate.
sentences.chinese: 看着她走遠，我頓感夜色的迷人開始消散。

sentences.english: Does eating fruits and veggies make you more attractive?
sentences.chinese: 喫水果和素食真的能讓你更迷人嗎？

sentences.english: The charming landscape which I saw this morning, is indubitably made up of some twenty or thirty farms.
sentences.chinese: 今晨我見迷人景色，無疑由二十至三十個農場組成。

sentences.english: In the Mogul garden, the chadhar idealizes the mountain and its stream.
sentences.chinese: 在莫臥兒人的花園中，跌水使山川和溪流變得更迷人。

sentences.english: Campuss of autumn of blossoming flowers, the scent of airtime, charming.
sentences.chinese: 秋天的校園鮮花朵朵，爭奇鬥豔，芬芳迷人。

sentences.english: Was it her alluring, powder-blue eyes?
sentences.chinese: 是因爲她迷人深邃的藍色眼眸？

sentences.english: Her charm prejudiced the judges in her favour.
sentences.chinese: 她姿色迷人，因而評委都偏向她。

sentences.english: Very soon, in came an enchantingly handsome young man.
sentences.chinese: 一位迷人的英俊男子進來了。

sentences.english: You’re funny, charming, and good-looking in the candle light.
sentences.chinese: 約會的燭光下，帥氣的你表現得既幽默又迷人。

definition: mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
